trans-unit.source: Provides a safe handle that can be used by Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供可被 Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) 物件使用的安全控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: for permission to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的權限。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptHandle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptHandle" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: for permission to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的權限。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: The pre-existing handle to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的既有控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Using <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> returns an invalid handle.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> 傳回無效的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The parent handle of this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptHandle" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptHandle" /> 的父控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptHandle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptHandle" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parentHandle" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parentHandle" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parentHandle" /> is closed.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parentHandle" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="parentHandle" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parentHandle" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: Releases a handle used by a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) object.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) 物件使用的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the handle is released successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功釋放控制代碼，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases a native handle used by a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) object.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) 物件使用的原生控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the handle is released successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功釋放控制代碼，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
